metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14196 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: In PowerDNS Recursor versions up to and including 4.3.1, 4.2.2 and 4.1.16, the ACL restricting access to the internal web server is not properly enforced.

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
